short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extend the default chrome tab support allowing among other things close tabs to the left, duplicate tab, background tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power tab extends the default chrome tab-support allowing among other things close tabs to the left, duplicate tab and background tabs.
